items.sentence: Do you really think I\'m going to forget you?
Everybody knows Tom and Mary like each other.
Everyone in my family can play an instrument.
I\'ll come visit you at your office tomorrow.
I\'ll even buy you a new car if you want one.
I\'ll make sure Tom does that sometime today.
I found the gloves that were under the chair.
I hate people who smoke in non-smoking areas.
How did you know Tom would be here this week?
How difficult was it for you to learn French?
How do you decorate your house for Christmas?
How long ago was it that you lived in Boston?
I don\'t think it\'ll be easy for me do that.
I don\'t think it\'s anything to worry about.
Why do you say such horrible things about me?
Someone must\'ve told Tom, but it wasn\'t me.
Tom was surprised by Mary\'s choice of words.
Tom wasn\'t an easy person to get along with.
Tom would tell me if he wasn\'t happy, right?
It\'s crowded, so let\'s take the next train.
